title: Lvl 6 and 7 mastery
body: Lvl 6 and 7 champion mastery is introduced, goes into game, plays darius, gets S rank, plays another game of darius, gets S rank, forges into lvl 6 mastery, plays another game of darius, gets S rank, 2 more tokens then I get lvl 7. GG THIS IS TOO EASY

replies.body: But you have to have champion shards as well?
Or 500 champion essence and I got a lot of champion shards I can disenchant
Yeah it seems pretty easy to level past 5 now, just get 300+ farm and you will get atleast an s- guaranteed
